title: New Epic skins: Sweetheart Xayah and Rakan

replies.body: Don't forget about {{champion:133}}. Q_Q
Ahh I can't believe we we left her out of that image! But don't worry, she's not forgotten in the store and will be available along with everything else :)
Even the skin teams are forgetting about our girl. The meme is too real.
LMAO

There are actually a few more missing, but we only needed three for this video! We did not forget her 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Who?
I noticed that too poor quinn ;_;
Vayne and quinn forgotten, now i understand why they make a new 1v1 marksmen, they just don't remember the old one (combo breaker if it's a crossbow user too >-<)
She's in there, just not the images above.
Can I ask why these are legacy? I remember before last year, the Valentine's Day skins were always permanent :(
Xayah and Rakan will be available until the end of Valentine's Day 2019

So these two specifically will be available until next year? That's good to know.

Wish that applied to Lucian as well, but it is what it is.
Will we get a "bad breakup" skin line at that point then?

Oh wow, only one package with exclusive content that is locked behind a bundle? I'm surprised they don't have special chromas or borders you can only get if you buy them together.

Because that's what you've been doing with this ridiculous Lunar Revel event. Locking so much exclusive content behind bundles just to up charge for content people don't want. You do know that to unlock all the Golden Chroma skins you'd have to spend $121 buying useless bundles of 42 chests to get the necessary Silver Tokens? Yeah...﻿

Hmm the "Sweethearts Set" bundle says 20% off, and would cost 3840 individually, without the champions. Yet the bundle costs 3086...did some calculation and 80% of 3840 is in fact 3072. On this page, the "Lovebirds Ward" is incorrectly listed as 650 RP when it's 640 in the client store. Even taking 20% off of 3850 isn't 3086 but rather 3080. Why is there an extra 14 RP charge? That would make the bundle more of 19.6% off, NOT 20% off as it states. 14 RP might be a small amount but it might be a difference in the future when you need that last 5 RP or something. 

TL;DR The Sweetheart Xayah and Rakan bundle is off by about 0.4% or 14 RP, please explain. {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Will the older skins be available individually or just in a bundle? I've been waiting ALL YEAR for Sweetheart Sona! D:
They are available individually

YAY! YOU'VE MADE MY WEEK! :) Buying Sweetheart Sona tonight! 

{{sticker:sona-playing}}
I'm saddened by the lack of bundles for Sweetheart Xayah individually, but I guess that's the point of the celebration. lol.
Wait where’s vayne

Welcome to the Rift, a place where lovers come together and try to find a match! Today, we have {{champion:22}} , {{champion:37}} , {{champion:61}} , {{champion:110}} , {{champion:1}}  (wait arent you too young for this?), {{champion:236}} , {{champion:498}}  and {{champion:497}} ! ({{champion:133}}  will be flying in soon!) Find out next time to see who wins!

Lucian with Quinn, Xayah with Rakan, Ashe is too cold hearted, Sona is mute so she can't confess, Ori is a robot so she doesn't understand emotions, and Annie is too young. Varus already has love inside him so he doesn't need to pair with anyone.
Technically Ori is like a cyborg now. She used to have emotions.
Thank you Riot for using ASL in the Emote {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} <3 Even happier that it's Sona~ {{sticker:sona-playing}}
yo deaf? XD well I am tho...
WHEN ARE SSG XAYAH AND RAKAN COMING OUT???{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
around summer time, thats when the skt skins came out last year
I have a question i know its like 2 years late. But are the icons and emotes gonna be available this year as well or should i bid them Au revoir?
Hurray, Sweetheart Sona is available now! :) Thanks Riot! (especially that one person)
Can I just buy the GG emote? It is the only one I gonna use...
Are the Xayah {{champion:498}} and Rakan {{champion:497}} skins up for a limited time like the other Sweetheart skins in the store?
Are the Xayah and Rakan skins permanent or legacy?
Will the Xayah And Rakan skin and the bundles all be available till 2/26?
I wonder if they will do a gender-swap skin in the future for some LGBT representation.
